quote: ...I think that people who make judgements about other people they don't even know are shallow, and people who start rumors are shallow, and I really don't care what shallow people say about me.
quote_letters: I THINK THAT PEOPLE WHO MAKE JUDGEMENTS ABOUT OTHER PEOPLE THEY DONT EVEN KNOW ARE SHALLOW AND PEOPLE WHO START RUMORS ARE SHALLOW AND I REALLY DONT CARE WHAT SHALLOW PEOPLE SAY ABOUT ME
